description:
Description
This compact yet versatile eyeshadow palette is designed for on-the-go beauty lovers. Each palette consists of five highly pigmented shades in a perfect combination of matte, shimmer, and glitter textures.The smooth and blendable formula ensures effortless application, making it ideal for both natural and dramatic eye looks. Its pocket-size packaging allows for easy portability, so you can enhance your makeup anytime, anywhere.Whether you're creating a soft daytime look or a bold evening statement, this palette has you covered.

How To Use
Take an appropriate amount using a brush or fingertips and blend softly around the eyes.

Key Ingredients1. SodaTalc, Silica, Mica, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Phenyl Trimethicone, Titanium Dioxide, Dimethicone, Magnesium Myristate, Calcium Titanium Borosilicate, Manganese Violet, Trihydroxystearin, Macadamia Seed Oil, Ultramarines, Pentaerythrityl Tetraiso Stearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Carmine, Ethylhexylglycerin, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Black Iron Oxide, Aluminum Hydroxide, Kaolin, Tin Oxide, Tocopherol.2. CottonTalc, Silica, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Phenyl Trimethicone, Dimethicone, Magnesium Myristate, Trihydroxystearin, Macadamia Seed Oil, Pentaerythrityl Tetraiso Stearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Carmine, Glyceryl Caprylate, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Ethylhexylglycerin, Aluminum Hydroxide, Red Iron Oxide, Ultramarines, Yellow Iron Oxide, Tocopherol.3. CandyTalc, Silica, Mica, Titanium Dioxide, Calcium Sodium Borosilicate, Phenyl Trimethicone, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Dimethicone, Magnesium Myristate, Carmine, Trihydroxystearin, Macadamia Seed Oil, Pentaerythrityl Tetraiso Stearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Yellow 4 (CI 19140), Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Ultramarines, Ethylhexylglycerin, Aluminum Hydroxide, Red Iron Oxide, Tin Oxide, Yellow Iron Oxide, Tocopherol.4. PoppingCalcium Sodium Borosilicate, Calcium Aluminum Borosilicate, Diphenylsiloxy Phenyl Trimethicone, Calcium Titanium Borosilicate, Polypropylene, Phytosteryl/Isostearyl/Cetyl/Stearyl/Behenyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Bis-Behenyl/Isostearyl/Phytosteryl Dimer Dilinoleyl Dimer Dilinoleate, Bis-Diglyceryl Polyacyladipate-2, Titanium Dioxide, Dipentaerythritol Hexahydroxy Stearate/Hexastearate/Hexarosinate, Tin Oxide, Caprylyl Glycol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Ethylhexylglycerin, Tocopherol.5. CloudTalc, Silica, Mica, Methyl Methacrylate Crosspolymer, Phenyl Trimethicone, Dimethicone, Magnesium Myristate, Titanium Dioxide, Yellow Iron Oxide, Trihydroxystearin, Macadamia Seed Oil, Ultramarines, Black Iron Oxide, Red Iron Oxide, Pentaerythrityl Tetraiso Stearate, Caprylyl Glycol, Glyceryl Caprylate, Carmine, Triethoxycaprylylsilane, Ethylhexylglycerin, Aluminum Hydroxide, Tocopherol.

description:
Description

A 6-pan palette offers natural yet unique color combinations for creating stunning eye makeup looks.
Provides various eye shadow textures from velvet matte, paint shimmer, satin shimmer, jelly shimmer, matte glitter, shine glitter, crystal glitter, aurora glitter to shine balm, a tone changer to deliver you a brand new makeup experience.
The fine and soft powder adheres to skin seamlessly without fading or clumping.
#01 Beginning: Brown-tone colors with a cool watery aurora glitter to create moody daily eye makeup looks.
#02 Attention: Cool purple colors with a yellow shine balm as a tone changer to create your desired shade by yourself.
#03 Prim Rose: Soft rosy pink colors for creating refreshing and clean makeup looks.
#04 Tan Peach: Subtle peachy beige colors for creating sun-kissed natural makeup looks.
How To Use

Use your fingers or an eyeshadow brush to apply on eyelids.

description:

Matte - A combination of fine particles delivers a soft, velvety texture with a touch of moisture. 
Glitter - Optimally blended high-viscosity oil with excellent refractive index provides a thin, smooth adhesion.

Rosehip fruit oil - Rich in vitamins, providing nourishment and hydration to the skin.
Apple seed oil - Helps keep the skin moisturized, supporting hydration and soothing.
Macadamia seed oil - Aids in restoring dry skin, leaving it smooth and supple.
Jojoba seed oil - Boosts collagen production and promotes skin regeneration.
Apricot seed oil - High in unsaturated fatty acids, helping to brighten and add shine to the skin.
Avocado oil - Delays moisture loss, maintaining skin's hydration.

- This fruit-inspired vegan palette features seven matte and glittery formulations for eye and cheek makeup.
- Formulated with ultra-fine powders which allows even color blending without any caking.

#01 Apricot Mood: Refreshing peachy palette for warm tone
#02 Strawberry Mood: Lovely strawberry palette for cool tone

How To Use
Appy onto eyelid or cheek using a blending brush or sponge tip.To create a more iridescent effect and to minimize fallout, use your fingertip to pat color onto the eyelid.

reviews.title: Bare Layer Palette 01 Apricot Mood
reviews.content: A refreshing peachy palette for warm tone, contains 7 shades: 4 matte, 2 glitter and 1 blush. The texture is great, easy to use and manageable, the shades are very light and the glitters are beautiful so is perfect to create a “soft peachy look” or for daily makeup. Love the packaging, the heart shaped blush is so cute, the shade is very light so i use it as a base blush. I recommend this palette for spring warm tones who wants a light coral/peachy palette.

description:
Description
Sparkling eye shadow comes with 5 shades of hologram jewel glitter color to create glamorous eye makeup 
Contain Prism Jewel Complex (Diamond Powder, Sapphire Powder, Amethyst Powder, Ruby Powder and Pearl Powder) for lustrous express 
Soft texture containing Silicon Gel content offers smooth application and highly adhesive effectSuggested Use
Use tip or brush to get color to spread evenly over the line of eyelid.

reviews.title: Favorite Shadows!
reviews.content: This eyeshadow is literally my absolute favorite. I have 9 different shades! It is dimensional and blends well. I wish I could buy all the shades.

reviews.title: Very small fine glitter shimmer
reviews.content: I like how shimmery and fine the glitter prism is but I wish it had more color payoff/pigment. But other than that it very good for everyday where!

reviews.title: Beautiful, long lasting color
reviews.content: Was really impressed with the color of this eye shadow, and it stayed on without creasing all day

description:
Description

CLIO Pro Eye Palette - Used by aespa Upgraded high-quality color 
-The real daily color combination that's so precious that nothing is to be wasted
-The upgraded texture that not only has clear high-pixel pigmentation but also long-lasting clean adhesion without pearl or powder flying 
-Renewed with the perfect brush on top of softly gliding shading and tap tap glitter point

11 Walking On The Cosy Alley : Cozy nude brown in soft and deep mood
12 Autumn Breeze In Seoul Forest : Warm brown embracing the autumn colors, fallen leaves, and autumn sunshine
13 Picnic By The Sunset : Mauve-toned emotional colors with evening glow 

Suggested Use

Using a brush or your fingertips to apply eye shadow only eyelids.

reviews.title: DONT GET IT
reviews.content: this is one of the products that are only being sold for the artist on the package. Don't get it it's bad! Doesn't stay at all unless u use a shit ton of spray which isn't convenient for college everyday life. I don't recommend it. Other Clio pro eye pallets might be a bit but this one should've been 5$ for it's quality. (Sorry for the picture, it's my cat cause style Korean won't let me use the actual product pictures bc of it's size:( enjoy the cat!)

description:
Description

Thickly apply the point color, at the middle of the shadow, on the eyelids.Apply the liner color, at the bottom of the shadow, between eyelashes to express deeper colors. Great for shading, highlighting, contouring and lining.
 

Suggested Use

Use fingertips or brush to apply shadow onto eyelids.

reviews.title: Same great shadow!
reviews.content: I bought my first one of this product over a decade ago and it was amazing. Great pigment, texture and easy to use. So convenient for simple eyeshadow looks. Missha really understands “if it ain’t broke, don’t fix it!” They avoid unnecessary reformulations and products re-releases because they know they deliver on quality and price. Unbeatable!
